# tableau_group (Data Source)

Retrieve group details

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "tableau_group" "test_group" {
  name = "Test Group"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Group name

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the group
